name: Rocket Jump
entries: At 10th level, you can use your firearms to make a narrow escape. You can expend a use of Shoot to Thrill, and then replace one of your attacks with a firearm with a Rocket Jump, which allows you to immediately fly up to 30ft in an arc in a direction of your choice. This does not provoke opportunity attacks. If there were creatures within 5ft of your starting point, Creatures within 5ft must make a Dexterity Saving Throw (DC equal to 8 + Proficiency Bonus + Dexterity) all creatures hit then take the firearmâ€™s damage. You still take falling damage as normal.
